ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( Name = VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract__c.Fields.Name , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract__c.Fields.Name, Name ),
not( Id=VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract__c.Fields.Id , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract__c.Fields.Name, Name )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Contract Name already exists, please enter different Name.
